name: Persona O.A.
summary:
A free-to-play spin-off game for the Persona series. 
 
The app will be used to deliver news and information about the persona games series. It may also be used in future events for the series. 
 
The game portion of the app will be a simple exploration game where you choose a character and persona to explore and clear a palace to earn Persona Points and get experience for the persona you used as well as increase the bond between the character and persona. 
 
After clearing a Palace, with a persona your character has a high bond level with, you will trigger exclusive dialogue events written just for this app. 
 
Persona Points can be used to summon other personas for the exploration game. They can also be used to unlock web content and event applications. 
Persona Points will be available through related products, QR and serial codes exclusive to the app
